header.title: Event Planning Meeting for Dime Savvy Car Showcase and Shaver Gaming Event
header.purpose: To discuss plans for the upcoming events, focusing on logistics, budget, and marketing.
header.attendees: Alia, Sebastian, Asfar, Jet, Kang, Rohimi

tasks.Description: Finalize power strip specifications for Central Court layout with Jet
Follow up on Klang Sound's quote and availability
Inform downstairs personnel to stick with Central Court for the car showcase
Push Jumbo Rentals for at least a 10% cut on the sound system quote
Draft the Shaver Gaming media invites
Lock in Ken Lim's Twitch slot for Shaver Gaming
Handle the Dime Savvy media invites
Confirm the costume rack specs with Tech Zone and email the sketch to make sure to release purchase order
Submit the police traffic permit applications for both events
Follow up with the fire department regarding the COVID-19 SOP and fire safety clearance for both events
Confirm the concrete delivery date for the VR demo gear with the vendor and update the shared document
Map out specific routes and timings for loading and unloading cars and gaming equipment with Sebastian
Coordinate closely with mall operators to ensure minimal disruption to mall goers during setup and teardown for both events
Talk to Esports channel about featuring a segment on the CYD Nova EV
Reach out to HyperX and Logitech, the Shaver Gaming sponsors, to explore cross-promotional budget
Chase Asfar to resubmit the New G Store renovation fire safety audit and ensure clearance is sorted
